content: We're having a discussion re: COVID scheduling in #smart/scheduling-links > Time zones for slots, locations -- is there any recommended practice for a Location to explicitly advertise its time zone? (I don't mean "how can a location express FHIR datetimes with the right offset or code", but rather "how can a Location list its https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tz_database value, like: I operate in America/New_York ".)
